name: remember-me
description: Persistent memory capabilities for Claude across conversations
long_description: A powerful Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides persistent memory capabilities for Claude, allowing it to store and retrieve information across conversations. Features semantic search, intelligent categorization, and priority-based memory management.

api_url.description: The URL of your Remember Me HTTP API server

api_key.description: Your Remember Me API key for authentication
